articles.description: Experts deconstruct the gaps in the science behind Ramdev’s new apparent ‘COVID-19 cure.’
articles.content:
As the world looks for vaccines and treatments for coronavirus, Baba Ramdevs Patanjali has released a drug that he claims is a coronavirus cure with a 100 per cent recovery rate.

articles.title: How much should you exercise daily to boost your immunity? - Times of India
articles.description: Having a strong immune system is necessary at any point of time to stay safe from disease-causing germs and viruses.
articles.content: Leading a sedentary lifestyle can be a prime reason for various health conditions. Exercising daily keeps your heart healthy, manages the symptoms of type 2 diseases, maintains your healthy weight an… [+511 chars]

articles.content:
